home.details: Teller is a secure and simple marketplace to buy and sell cryptocurrencies with people near you.
home.securityDetails: Security is our top priority – connect, chat, and transact with peers using secure technology.
home.peerToPeerDetails: You own your funds, you manage your transactions – no unnecessary middle men.
home.worldwideDetails: Obtain and transact in whatever currency you choose no matter where you are in the world.
home.permissionlessDetails: Join anonymously and begin transacting instantly - with anyone and everyone.
home.mostPopularOffersDetails: Choose from a growing number of sellers
home.howTradeWorksDetails: Teller offers a decentralized, safe and private solution.
home.mainnetWarningTitle: Warning: You are on Ethereum's mainnet
home.mainnetWarningDetails1: This is a short disclaimer to warn you that the contracts used in this Dapp are not audited yet.
home.mainnetWarningDetails2: Make sure to keep that in mind before transacting meaningful amounts of money.

general.noContactMethodAvailable: No contact method for this user

app.priceError: Error while fetching prices. Opening a trade will not be possible until the issue is resolved.

ethereumEnable.createOffer: Connect wallet in order to see your crypto assets
ethereumEnable.buyContact: Please give access to your address before you can  sign
ethereumEnable.profile: Please give access to your address before you can view your profile

sellerApproval.title: Seller Management
sellerApproval.onlyForArbis: This feature is only available to arbitrators
sellerApproval.settingSwitchToOn: Setting this switch to "On" will make it so that all sellers can choose you as an arbitrator
sellerApproval.ableToBlacklist: If you activate it, you will still be able to blacklist sellers individually
sellerApproval.blacklistExplanation: Even though you accept every seller, you can blacklist some sellers if you suspect them to be malicious

createEscrowFrom.title: Create an Escrow
createEscrowFrom.expiration: Expiration (must be at least in 10 minutes)

sellerFiatContainer.title: What local currency do you want to trade with?

fiatSelectorForm.selectValid: Select a valid currency to move to the next page

sellerArbitratorContainer.title: Select an arbitrator for this offer

arbitratorSelectorForm.selectValid: Select a valid arbitrator to move to the next page
arbitratorSelectorForm.noApprovals: No arbitrator has approved you yet. To request approval from an arbitrator, go to <1>Manage arbitrators</1> in your Profile

sellerMarginContainer.title: What margin do you want to use for your rate?

marginSelectorForm.enterMargin: Enter a margin to move to the next page
marginSelectorForm.ourFee: Teller network charges {{percentage}}% of each transaction
marginSelectorForm.noPrice: Unable to calculate your price since token prices are unavailable for now

license.title: License
license.onceArbi: Once you have your license, you can make tokens by judging disputes
license.onceSeller: Once you are a seller you will be able to create offers
license.noArbiLicense: You don't have an arbitrator license
license.noSellerLicense: You don't have a seller license

map.searchPlaceholder: Enter a city or ZIP code
map.denied: You denied access to your position. We do not store that information, it is only to position you the following map.

validators.isInteger: This field needs to be an integer
validators.isEmail: This field needs to be a valid email address
validators.isNumber: This field needs to be an number
validators.lowerThan: This field needs to be lower than {{max}}
validators.lowerEqThan: This field needs to be lower or equal than {{max}}
validators.higherThan: This field needs to be higher than {{min}}
validators.higherEqThan: This field needs to be higher or equal than {{min}}
validators.isAddress: This field needs to be a valid Ethereum address
validators.isContactCode: This field needs to be a valid Contact Code
validators.isJSON: This field needs to be a valid JSON string
validators.isEscrowPaymentSignature: Missing some of the needed properties. Needed are: `escrowId`, `message` and `type`

trades.title: My trades
trades.noActiveTrades: No active trades at the moment

offers.hiddenOffers: Other assets are hidden until you have ETH in your wallet

offer.noArbitrator: This offer does not have an arbitrator assigned
offer.isArbitrator: You are an arbitrator on this offer
offer.disabledBecauseArbi: Offer disabled because you are the seller or the arbitrator
offer.disabledBecausePrice: Offer disabled because we failed to fetch the token prices. Check back later.

offerTrade.disputeInfo: A dispute is a disagreement on a point of law or fact, a conflict of legal views or of interests between two persons.
offerTrade.enterBefore: Enter a fiat or asset quantity before submitting. Make sure the asset amount is between the limits above.
offerTrade.arbitratorInfo: <0>You can think of an arbitrator as a neutral <1>judge</1> who, when the trade comes to the <3>dispute</3>, will review the trade and resolve the dispute.</0>
offerTrade.sellerBalance: This is the current balance of the seller. This is why it is the maximum
offerTrade.amountWarning: Amount is greater than the seller's balance
offerTrade.newOrderDelay: New orders can be created for free in {{time}}

contactForm.statusPlaceholder: Status contact code or Status ENS name
contactForm.contactDetailsWarning: Contact details will be written on the blockchain
contactForm.consider: Consider which method you choose as buyers and arbitrators will contact you using it

sellerLicenseInfo.title: Value propositions/info about a seller license

cacheSettings.title: Cache settings
cacheSettings.pressToReset: Press this button to reset your local cache.
cacheSettings.willDelete: This will delete your current cache and up to date data will be loaded.
cacheSettings.noPermanentLoss: None of your data will be permanently lost

notificationSettings.title: Notifications
notificationSettings.success: Success subscribing. Please check your emails to verify your subscription

validateEmail.title: Validating your email address
validateEmail.noToken: No token specified in the URL. Make sure you paste the whole URL from the email you received
validateEmail.success: You email address was verified successfully

loading.mining: Waiting for the confirmation from miners
loading.initial: The best and most convenient way to buy and sell crypto

provider.title: Your browser doesn't support web3 standards

network.title: Network is not supported
network.tip: Switch your wallet to Rinkeby Network

sntTokenError.title: Couldn't find SNT token
sntTokenError.tip: Switch to a network that supports SNT

404.title: Page not found
404.tip: The page your were looking for doesn't exist. Do you wish to go back to the previous page or the Home?

arbitration.title: Become an arbitrator
arbitration.noArbitrationLabel: No arbitrator found. Disputes cannot be opened
arbitration.ownDispute: You cannot arbitrate your own disputes
arbitration.notYours: You are not the arbitrator of this dispute

motive.unresponsiveBuyer: Buyer is unresponsive/inactive after transaction is marked as paid
motive.unresponsiveSeller: Seller is unresponsive/inactive after transaction is marked as paid
motive.paymentBuyer: Buyer made attempt to pay but there are issues with the payment
motive.paymentSeller: Seller states something is wrong with payment and refuses to release

arbitrators.title: Arbitrators
arbitrators.arbitratorsList: Here you can see a list of arbitrators that have approved you as a seller and request approval by those that have not.

cancelEscrow.expire: Once funded, an escrow can only be canceled by you after it expires (in <1>{{amountTime}}</1>)

page.getNotifs: Get notifications on important trade events
page.arbiRuledAgainst: Arbitrator ruled in your opponent’s favor

approve.authorize: You authorize the contract to transfer {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}} on your behalf. This can only occur when you approve a transaction to authorize the transfer
approve.shouldReset: Your {{tokenSymbol}} allowance for this contract ({{allowance}} {{tokenSymbol}}) is less than the required ({{requiredToken}} {{tokenSymbol}}). Reset your {{tokenSymbol}} allowance before approving the required amount

cancel.cancelAndWithdraw: Cancel trade and withdraw funds back
cancel.onlyETH: Only ETH and SNT transactions can be canceled when you don't have enough balance in your wallet

done.finishedWhen: Trade is finished once every step above is complete

funding.waitingForSeller: Waiting for the seller to fund an escrow
funding.needToFund: You need to fund an escrow. The buyer is waiting for you
funding.youNeedToApprove: You need to approve the transfer of tokens first to allow our contract to transfer the tokens on your behalf.
funding.doNotWorry: Do not worry, the approval is only for the amount in this escrow.

waiting.title: Waiting for the confirmations from the miners

openDispute.followProgress: Follow the progress of your dispute in the profile.
openDispute.describeDetails: Describe the details of your trade
openDispute.sellerUnresponsive: You have made the payment, but the seller is unresponsive
openDispute.buyerUnresponsive: The buyer has marked trade as paid, but is unresponsive and inactive
openDispute.sellerPayment: You have made the payment, the seller is responsive but states that something is wrong with the payment process and refuses to release
openDispute.buyerPayment: The buyer is active, has made an attempt to pay, but there are issues with the payment
openDispute.durationProcess: The process of resolving your dispute could take up to 5 days.

release.sellerWillRelease: Seller will release funds from the escrow to your wallet
release.paymentDone: Payment done by the buyer. Check that you received it and release the funds
release.waitForBuyerToSend: Wait for the buyer to send you the money, then you can release
release.paymentHasBeenConfirmed: Payment has been confirmed and money released

sendMoney.pleaseSend: Please send <1>{{fiatAmount}} {{fiatSymbol}}</1> to the seller through the decided payment method
sendMoney.buyerWillSend: Buyer will send money to you

notifications.youWillBeAsked: You will be asked for your permission to send notifications
notifications.onlyToInform: Those notifications are only to inform you of changes to your trades and offers

emailNotifications.notifOnTrades: Get notifications on new trades and important trade events.
emailNotifications.youCanChange: This is optional. You can always change this setting in the Notification Settings in your Profile.
emailNotifications.success: Success subscribing. Please check your emails to verify your subscription

priceWarning.aboveWarning: The price for this trade ({{price}} {{fiatSymbol}}) is {{margin}}% above the current price for {{tokenSymbol}} ({{currentPrice}} {{fiatSymbol}})
priceWarning.belowWarning: The price for this trade ({{price}} {{fiatSymbol}}) is {{margin}}% below the current price for {{tokenSymbol}} ({{currentPrice}} {{fiatSymbol}})
priceWarning.onlyContinueIf: Only continue if you are comfortable with this price
